item.title: Modifying Hexo Theme Code Highlighting
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Hexo’s default theme uses black code highlighting. Want a different style? This article explains how to modify Hexo theme code highlighting styles.
